result.title: Dissemination and Communication Plan
result.description: This deliverable will set out the dissemination and communication strategy and the activities to be undertaken to achieve this. Results of the dissemination work will be reported in the periodic and final reports.

result.title: Requirements on the eFlows4HPC software stack from Pillar II and evaluation metrics.
result.description: This report will include a prioritized list of requirements that will guide the design and implementation of the different Pillar II use cases as well as of the core eFlows4HPC components. The deliverable will also include a set of metrics to be used in the evaluation of the developed workflows

result.title: Optimized kernels for EPI
result.description: In this report the optimized kernels for the EPI will be described. Their implementation on the emulated hardware platform will be provided and its projected performance and energy saving. This deliverable will collect the work from task T3.3, including associatedevaluation work from T3.6.

result.description: This deliverable will be the first production version of Data Logistics service integration with selected storage technology and demonstration of a data pipeline motivated by the Pillars’ use cases. Task 2.3 and 2.4 contribute to this deliverable.

result.title: Application bottlenecks and optimization opportunities on heterogeneous components
result.description: This report will include the identified bottlenecks as well as a preliminary analysis of such issues when considering the communication architecture, the storage architecture, and the use of heterogeneous components. This report will be the baseline for the work of the remaining tasks in this WP. This deliverable will collect theoutcome from task T3.1.

result.title: Optimized kernels for heterogeneous components
result.description: This document will reflect the final version of the optimized kernels developed in the project for the use of heterogeneous components. result.title: Initial draft of optimized kernels for EPI
result.description: In this report the draft version of the optimized kernels for the EPI will be described. Their implementation on the emulated hardware platform will be provided and its projected performance and energy saving. This deliverable will collect the work from task T3.3, including associated evaluation work from T3.6.
